newItem.page.itemImagesHeader: Upload up to 4 pictures of the item you wish to exchange:

settings.page.title: Settings
my.account.show.my.data.bottom: Get a copy of all the data you have stored on Bart
my.account.show.my.data.dialog.body1: We will prepare a copy of all the data you have stored on Bart. This may take upto a day.
my.account.show.my.data.dialog.body2: After that, you will receive an email with a link to download your data.
my.account.delete.dialog.body1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
my.account.delete.dialog.body2: You will not be able to recover your data after this.
my.account.onboarding.reset.bottom: You will be welcomed the next time you log in
dark.mode.label: Dark Mode
language.label: Language
about.easter.egg.toast1: {tapsLeft} tap left for a secret message!
about.easter.egg.toast2: {tapsLeft} taps left for a secret message!
easter.egg.dialog.1: Thank you for sticking with us, the best is yet to come!
easter.egg.dialog.2: Made for you with ❤️, by Lahiru & Hemaka.
switch.to.new.ui.2: Use the new design to unlock more features!
about.text: Bart is a mobile application that aims to provide a platform for users to buy, sell or barter goods and services.
tute.start.subHeader: Take a tour of the app
tute.homepage.0: Click here to go to the Home page
tute.homepage.incoming: You will see all your incoming trades under this section
tute.homepage.outgoing: You will see all outgoing trades you have made under this section
tute.homepage.tbc.1: A trade that is To Be Completed is either:
tute.homepage.tbc.2: An outgoing trade that is accepted by the other party
tute.homepage.tbc.3: An incoming trade that you have accepted
tute.homepage.tbc.5: You will see all of them under this section
tute.homepage.sth: All completed trades that were successful will show up under this section
tute.chatPage.1: Click here to go to the Chat Overview page
tute.chatPage.2: This page is where all your chats will be displayed
tute.marketPage.1: Click here to go to the Market page
tute.marketPage.2.1: Click here to view all the listed items available in the market
tute.marketPage.2.2: You can make all your listed items available for trade here and make return offers to other users.
tute.profilePage.1: Click here to go to the Profile page
tute.profilePage.2: You can view your profile details and edit your username here
tute.settingsPage.1: Click here to open the side menu
tute.settingsPage.2: Click here to open the settings page
tute.settingsPage.3: From this page, you can change your colour theme, language and handle your user account
onboarding.page.3.2: We'll call you by your username,
onboarding.page.3.4: but you can change your name and username later.
onboarding.page.3.5: Let's get you aquainted with Bart and start trading!
